instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a global ThemeProvider using 'next-themes' or similar context for dark mode toggling.
Replace all 'isLoading' boolean checks with Skeleton components from shadcn/ui.
Wrap all page contents in a 'motion.div' with the 'page_transition' variant.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings (h1-h6) and 'Public Sans' for body text.
Ensure all forms use 'react-hook-form' with 'zod' validation, styled with shadcn Form components.
Implement the Sidebar with a collapsible state that persists in local storage.
Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (success, error, info).
For the Dashboard, use a Bento Grid layout (CSS Grid) to arrange widgets asymmetrically.
Ensure all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Do not use default HTML tables; use the shadcn Table component with proper header/body separation.
Apply 'glassmorphism' utility classes to sticky headers and modal overlays.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
